metadata.title: CVE-2024-38566 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: bpf:Fix verifier assumptions about socket->sk The verifier assumes that 'sk'field in 'struct socket' is valid and non-NULL when 'socket' pointer itselfis trusted and non-NULL. That may not be the case when socket was justcreated and passed to LSM socket_accept hook. Fix this verifier assumptionand adjust tests.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
